data.name: Highway Rampage
data.detailed_description:
Rogue drivers pilot a high-octane run over miles of post-apocalyptic terrain, escaping the ruthless grip of the forces that thirst for their blood. Choose your driver and see if you've got what it takes to make it through wasteland highways, dodging, disarming, and destroying your opposition!

Features:
- Customizable weapon loadouts
- Upgrades
- Roguelike elements
- Unlockable drivers
- Branching Pathways
data.about_the_game:
Rogue drivers pilot a high-octane run over miles of post-apocalyptic terrain, escaping the ruthless grip of the forces that thirst for their blood. Choose your driver and see if you've got what it takes to make it through wasteland highways, dodging, disarming, and destroying your opposition!

Features:
- Customizable weapon loadouts
- Upgrades
- Roguelike elements
- Unlockable drivers
- Branching Pathways
data.short_description: Rogue drivers pilot a high-octane run over miles of post-apocalyptic terrain, escaping the ruthless grip of the forces that thirst for their blood. Choose your driver and see if you've got what it takes to make it through wasteland highways, dodging, disarming, and destroying your opposition!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or above
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5500, GeForce 720,or Radeon HD 5570
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: (Integrated): Intel HD Graphics or AMD (formerly ATI) Radeon HD Graphics (Discrete): Nvidia GeForce GTX 760 (or greater) or AMD Radeon HD
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
